title: Development and Utilization Strategies for Library-Based Science Education Resources

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online learning platforms and foundational understanding of science curriculum content
context.additional_context: Online asynchronous learning environment for pre-service and in-service teachers to strengthen science education material development competencies, utilizing Bring Your Own Device (BYOD) for flexible learning

learning_goals: Systematically organize science-integrated digital educational materials using an LMS-based LibGuide platform
Propose effective lesson design plans utilizing online databases, multimedia tutorials, and supplementary learning resources
Develop educational material prototypes incorporating peer feedback and derive improvements through formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
